LanguageData.AS_AncientTechnology.label: Lost Ancient Technology
LanguageData.AS_AncientTechnology.description: Gain knowledge of lost ancient technology.
LanguageData.AS_Weapons.label: Ancient Species Basic Technology
LanguageData.AS_Weapons.description: Basic understanding of the technology used by certain ancient species. Several armaments can be created.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Weapons.label: Ancient Elf Weapons Technology
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Weapons.description: After examining the technology used by the Ancient Elves, some of their weapons can be crafted.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Apparels.label: Ancient Elf Clothing
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Apparels.description: After examining Ancient Elf technologies, some of their clothing can be crafted.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Weapons.label: Half-Elf Weapon Technology
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Weapons.description: Weapons can be created with half-elf knowledge and skills.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_AncientTechnology.label: Half-Elf Ancient Weapon Technology
LanguageData.AS_WHE_AncientTechnology.description: It is possible to create arms and items using the technology of ancient races, analyzed and improved by half-elves.
